BucketName.description: Specifies a name for the bucket. The bucket name must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens (-). A directory bucket name must be unique in the chosen Availability Zone. The bucket name must also follow the format 'bucket_base_name--az_id--x-s3' (for example, 'DOC-EXAMPLE-BUCKET--usw2-az1--x-s3'). If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the bucket name.

LocationName.description: Specifies the AZ ID of the Availability Zone where the directory bucket will be created. An example AZ ID value is 'use1-az5'.

DataRedundancy.description: Specifies the number of Availability Zone that's used for redundancy for the bucket.

Arn.description: Returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified bucket.
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified bucket.
